
                            
                            <p>这几天娃的恒温壶水上面总漂一层跟水垢似的东西，不知道是恒温壶出问题了还是家里净水器出问题了。平时都接净水器里的水，用恒温壶烧开然后降温致45度。 <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/25/210952whrlhlh75hzdecpz.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/25/210952whrlhlh75hzdecpz.jpg"> <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/25/211002qkk62f9rr9ek9fke.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/25/211002qkk62f9rr9ek9fke.jpg"> <br>  </p>
                            <p>
                                
                            </p>
